plot outline: Nithya Jothe Sathya is a story of a couple. Sathya, an ad- film maker in the movie and Nithya, a researcher in biology who experiences visual delusions. There is no chance that Nithya herself identifies the problem as she forgets all the things that have happened to her. Sathya has to rule out the problem that Nithya suffers. It is with his friends involvement that Sathya meets Dr. Devaraj, and together they solve the problem.
title: Nithya Jothe Sathya
plot: Sathya helps his wife realize the visual delusions that she experiences and does whatever it takes to cure her back to good mental health.

_Nithya Jothe Sathya_ (qv) is a story of a couple. Sathya, an ad- film maker in the movie and Nithya, a researcher in biology who experiences visual delusions. There is no chance that Nithya herself identifies the problem as she forgets all the things that have happened to her. Sathya has to rule out the problem that Nithya suffers. It is with his friends involvement that Sathya meets Dr. Devaraj, and together they solve the problem.
